translations: n．失败，战败：在竞争、战斗或争论中被击败或战胜。
· The team suffered several defeats before they finally won a game.
这支球队在最终赢得比赛之前遭受了几次失败。
v．击败，战胜：在竞争、战斗或争论中击败或战胜对手。

sentences.sentence: The world champion has only had two defeats in 20 fights.
sentences.translation: 这个世界冠军在20场拳击赛中只败过两场。

sentences.sentence: Our confidence in the team has been seriously undermined by their recent defeats.
sentences.translation: 该队最近的几次失败已严重动摇了我们对他们的信心。

sentences.sentence: We went inside the team's dressing room moments after one of the most embarrassing defeats in their history.
sentences.translation: 继该队遭遇史上最尴尬的失败之一后，我们走进了他们的更衣室。
